component.name: I Have No Tomatoes
component.summary: How many tomatoes can you smash in ten short minutes?

description.p: I Have No Tomatoes is an extreme leisure time activity idea of which culminates in the following question: How many tomatoes can you smash in ten short minutes? If you have the time to spare, this game has the vegetables just waiting to be eliminated!
An addictive 3D arcade game with support for both keyboards and controllers, as well as adding your own background music in the form of XM/S3M/IT/MOD files.
